title: Couple With Heart Man Man Light Skin Tone Medium Dark Skin Tone
description: Represents a romantic couple composed of two men, with specific skin tone variations. It signifies love, partnership, and affection between two males.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, this emoji beautifully illustrates two men embracing with a glowing heart between them, a testament to Apple's commitment to inclusive representation.  The men, depicted with light and medium-dark skin tones respectively, are rendered with Apple's characteristic glossy 3D shading and soft, rounded edges, exuding warmth and affection.  The heart between them radiates a gentle glow, symbolizing love, partnership, and deep connection, making it a cherished emoji for expressing romantic relationships between men on Apple platforms.
